name: You are loved
description:
I started making this a couple of months ago for a game jam. Then, life got in the way, I changed countries, went from first into second lockdown. Forgot about it until today, and then I finished it. It's not much, but I'm glad I made it.

Thanks to Ugo Nutchey for helping me build the game for Windows, and to my friends for being there when things got tough.
